name: ContrAll
description:
A platformer shooter game inspired by Contra 3. 

As a submission for PGG All-Play Accessibility game jam, this game features simply controls that require only one hand to play. 

All controls are with PC mouse:

  • LMB to walk left
  • RMB to walk right
  • Hold/Click both LMB and RMB to jump
  • You mousewheel to duck, stand up or fall off a platform
  • Click on enemy (runner or turret) to fire.

Collect heart orb to replenish health. 

Collect coins for your own personal satifcation.
